document.docAuthor: Williams, Bronwyn W. & Weaver, Patricia G.
document.masterDocTitle: A historical review of the taxonomy and classification of Entocytheridae (Crustacea: Ostracoda: Podocopida)

mods:titleInfo.mods:title: A historical review of the taxonomy and classification of Entocytheridae (Crustacea: Ostracoda: Podocopida)

subSubSection.paragraph:
1912
Entocythere Wm. S. Marshall.
—Müller: XXVII, 255, 317, 430 (C, K).

1942b
Cytherites Sars 1926
.—Hoff: 66, 69; genus
Cytherites
synonymized with genus
Entocythere
, but retained as a subgenus (T).

paragraph.materialsCitation:
1951
Entocythere Marshall.
— Rioja : 169, 170, 174 [as Entochythere , erroneous spelling], 175, 176 (C).

subSubSection.paragraph:
1960
Entocythere
.—Crawford: 26 [name appears only in title, although referred to in text body] (C, D)
1971 Entocytherinae Hoff, 1942.—Hobbs Jr.: 2, 3, 4, 7, 10, 14, 19 (C, D, H, K, T)
1985 subfamily Entocytheridae .—Hart et al. : 4, lapsus calami (C).
2017 Entocytherinae Hoff, 1942.—Weaver & Williams: 576, 577, 579, 583, 584 (C, D, E, K, R).
